website_summaries.verdict: A classic game of Trouble with a Shopkins twist.
pros: Popping the dome to roll the dice is a delight
As fun to play as the regular Trouble game
Game board is smaller than usual - much like a Shopkin
cons: Only the included pieces work with the game, which means you can't play it with your Shopkins

customer_reviews.title: My daughter will love this! It's very similar to the game Trouble
customer_reviews.text: My daughter will love this! It's very similar to the game Trouble, but with a Shopkins theme. The age recommendation is for 5+. For 2-4 players. The instructions are very easy to follow for this age group. There are a lot of small pieces, so it is important to keep away from smaller children. The plastic seems to be very strong and will be durable. It fits nice and easy right back into the box, which is AMAZING when it comes to games in my opinion. I'm happy with this purchase and I know my daughter will be tickled on Christmas morning.!!
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for mom and daughter!
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing this with my 5 year old every day since Christmas. We both love it. It goes pretty fast unless someone's piece gets repeatedly sent back to the corner. The game is easy enough for her to do herself. My only complaints are that the path could be more easily deliniated. The corner spots are often mistaken for the main path. An extra 1/2 inch of space between them and the path or a more clearly colored route around the board would make it easier to tell where to go. But we like it and I actually enjoy playing it with her!
customer_reviews.author: A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Trouble game
customer_reviews.text: Really not happy or satisfied. I’m actually frustrated and displeased. It’s not very strong... feels like it could break with one hard push. Also there were everlasting scratches in the bubble part where dice is. And the dice inside is so small u can barely read it. Not a happy customer! Would not recommend not even for smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: Proud customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fun board game
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old daughter and I play this game together. She somehow manages to beat me most of the time. When I win, she hasn't had a fit and accepts loss. Simple counting skills are needed. The only negative point I've come across, is when pushing down on the center bubble to roll the dice...the pieces will most likely fall out of place. It's kind of a nuisance and might be best to play with a regular dice if you have one laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Kolozvary Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year olds really enjoy this game. Everything worked fine right out of the box but I don't expect this ga.e to last very long as it is very cheaply made. Cheap plastic and cardboard is basically what it's made of. I only paid $4 for it so it is fine for the price. If you are looking for one that will last years, this probably isn't the one you want to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Karate4566

customer_reviews.title: Good game but my daughter is not interested
customer_reviews.text: It is not a very fun game. My 3 years old daughter just played it once. Also it depends on the interest, so someone really interested into board games like ladders'n'chute/Sorry might liked it too. Product is durable, and definitely will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Mangal

customer_reviews.title: Only lasting a year...
customer_reviews.text: So... One year and 25 days ago I bought this and it stopped working this last week. Warranty is one year. They told me there isn't anything they'll do for me. So this heated blanket receives one star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these when they were on sale to be able to gift to a local charity that provides for foster children. This was a great item to get. The kiddos went wild over it being Shopkins and they were all different age groups.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Non-Durable Materials
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys playing this game but she gets frustrated because the die doesn't pop so well. It is hard to push it down and many times the die doesn't "pop", it just rolls over. The mechanism that makes the die pop seems very cheap and flimsy. The plastic around the die also looks as if it could break easily. For the price I paid, it is what I would expect. But it is disappointing that so many childrens products are being made so cheaply and not intended to last.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked playing this game, but the game itself is thin cardboard. Not well made at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J Monares

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little game! I remember playing this sort of game when I was little. I purchased this as an add-on-item for purchasing $25 or more, only paying about $3. My kids love this game and I've played it several times with them already!!! I would definitely purchase this again and gift it! Great buy!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Devin R.

customer_reviews.title: like 20 times already
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game as a Christmas present for my daughter and we have probably played with it, like 20 times already. The game is really exciting and my kids and I had quite a few laughs playing it. It's quite unpredictable and pretty much based on luck. My girls thought it was boring at first, but it was because they missed some of the rules of the game. Once we played the game following all the rules, it became much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Joy

customer_reviews.title: We got it on a deal..
customer_reviews.text: We will be giving it as a gift. We purchased at the under $4 cost..so I think it is great for the cost. Looks like lower grade plastic, but should hold up fine if you aren't using it as a frisbee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the popper gets stuck really easy because they get excited and may push a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little game, but if you have smaller kids playing the game, the popper gets stuck really easy because they get excited and may push a bit too far... I settled that problem though, buying colored dice and whatever color they chose, they get dice to match...They seemed to like that better anyway.. On another note, when the Ganbabies go home, their PaPa and I play this game... we are in our 50's. lol
customer_reviews.author: lyn chote hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for our 4 yr old daughter to play and enjoy! We can all play! Very cute,easy to get out and play with no assembly! Like playing Trouble when I was a kid! FUN
customer_reviews.author: alissa johnson

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at such a great deal and thinking whatever just another board game. Well my family has played this game especially my little one who is 6 years old and loves Shopkins and we love it a lot. It is so much fun and everyone enjoys the game. This is definitely worth buying. Would definitely buy again if we lose or break this one. Thanks for making this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Drew

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with your kids
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this a few days but this was my daughter's favorite game out of several she received over the holidays. The Shopkins theme was a bonus because she's a big fan. I recommend playing this on the carpet or a shorter table because it can be a little tough for 5 year olds to be able to depress the bubble otherwise. Overall, this game is easy to play and I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: shopkins trouble game
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the shopkins version of trouble. bought for 6yo niece that loves all things shopkins. she ended up getting 2 of these, but her parents are separated so she gets a copy at each house. There are a ton of little pieces so not advised around younger kids that will put everything in their mouths. The dice in the middle is really small for adults and is just a piece of metal, but it's just the right size for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: RubaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: This game is exactly as advertised. It is an easy game to play and the Shopkins graphics makes it perfect for my Shopkins crazed granddaughter of 7. The game is a little flimsy, but worth the $8 I paid. I would buy again. Fast delivery and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game ! My 4 year old absolutely loves shopkins, so when we saw this I just HAD to get it! It's a very simple game and very easy to catch on to how it is played. My daughter is just not getting really into games so I try to find ones that are easy for her to comprehend at her age. She loves this game . I love how it is designed and how bright all the colors are . Its very interactive and would be a great gift for anyone who loves shopkins!
customer_reviews.author: ErikaV

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute to look at... but it is very very flimsy, the button is hard for kids to press and the dice doesn’t move well... wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kaiver

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun for an night in
customer_reviews.text: Great for family night! We couldn't be bothered with the design we just like the concept of the game and had loads of fun and this was the cheapest version!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Decowski

customer_reviews.title: Shopkins Pop 'N' Race Game
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Shopkins Pop 'N' Race Game and Shopkins Season 3 (2-Pack & Basket) together for a gift for my older granddaughters. They love Shopkins and this was perfect for them. They loved having a game to play as well as all of the other Shopkins they already had. I would recommend both of these product for any child who loves Shopkins.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Houpe

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a game all ages could play and no one would have an advantage. The first time we played our youngest grandson won the game against his older siblings. That made it all worth it. The board and pieces were cute and made sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: Don't pop dice too hard pieces jump
customer_reviews.text: Like- it's a very inexpensive and easy game for a young child. Dislike- push the bubble down too hard and all the pieces jump out of their holes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift Purchase for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandchildren for Christmas. I love that there are no dice to lose and the little ones will can play too. I know they all like Shopkins so when I saw this one sale there was no question over whether I should purchase them or not. They were all excited to open them and wanted to play right away. This was a very good sale purchase and well worth the money I spent to see the happy looks on their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R Mentzer

customer_reviews.title: Reminds Me of Being a Kid
customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter loves the shopkins, she is 6 years old and she never played this game, but she loved that it was shopkins and loved that we could send pop-pop home, and they kept sending me home. Well made and we had lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Scratch & dent item?
customer_reviews.text: The game works fine, but the packaging and the "pop" bubble look like a little rough like they came form the "scratch & dent" section. There are scratches on the pop bubble. Is this a returned item? A defect? This would not have been the one I chose off the shelf in person.
customer_reviews.author: DanTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Broke before finished first game
customer_reviews.text: This was cute, and I was excited to teach my daughter how to play. After each player had gone a few times, the popper quit popping, so you can't roll the dice. We could use a dice from a different game, but half the fun of these Trouble-type games is the popper. Everyone wanted to stop playing after that. Very disappointed with the quality of this game.
customer_reviews.author: Nsdad

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This was a little underwhelming. It is just Trouble with shopkins pictures. You can not use shopkins as the players. I knew that buying it but thought I would mention it. The plastic is flimsy and doesn't look like it will last too long. It was super cheap when I bought it so it was worth the little money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.Bethard

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game and my young grand children love to come play with grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda May

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: This was for a Christmas present for my Christmas Angel child at church. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: shadylady

customer_reviews.title: 00 so I do feel like amazon ripped me off and is making up for ...
customer_reviews.text: Again another ok game that was over priced. It is sold at Five Below for 5.00 so I do feel like amazon ripped me off and is making up for my free shipping/prime account with these prices.
customer_reviews.author: Beri Cafrelli

customer_reviews.title: Good for price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Cute game and fun to play. Like the game Trouble. Actual game is pretty flimsy and cracks easily, but it’s still cute
customer_reviews.author: AshleeC3

customer_reviews.title: Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Like Hungry, Hungry Hippos but with a Shopkins motif. My grand daughter really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for young kids. I played this with my 4 year old granddaughter. She likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane V. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Shopkintastic!
customer_reviews.text: A simple game that brings back memories of childhood for moms and dads. Our 6 year old daughter got this for Christmas 2015 and loves it. Maybe a little too much. She still wants to play while at the table eating super. Vivid colors and simple directions make this a hit for both the young and young at heart!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game--But Made Cheap 😢
customer_reviews.text: The game is easy and fun to play with child. However, it is not made well at all. Will play as long as it lasts. Got for 5.00
customer_reviews.author: Jesse JamesTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Pleased item was on time...
customer_reviews.text: Game is exactly as pictured. It's a gift so I've no idea what to say, except bd girl likes shopkins items so that's all matters. It's not like I can open gift play w it, then rewrap it. Lol although, that's a funny yet deviant thought. ;) Muhahaha
customer_reviews.author: DogBreath101

customer_reviews.title: good but need heavier pieces
customer_reviews.text: pieces are lightweight, when you press on bubble they fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Tico

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift item. Recieved a big thumbs up so in return I'm giving the review a big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Montoya

customer_reviews.title: 'Trouble' for the Shopkins obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This game is just the classic game 'Trouble' with Shopkins themed art. That being said, my 5-year-old had no idea what 'Trouble' was and enjoyed playing this. Even she commented on the flimsy tie-in; "Mom, this game doesn't really have anything to do with Shopkins. They just added pictures on the board". 😂 We had fun play by it, though!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes to play this game over and over. It's a game easy enough that she could play alone with her brother if she wanted. She absolutely loves Shopkins, so this was a no brainer. She had to have this for her Birthday. She loves racing around the board trying to win. I think the little pegs could be shopkins figures, but that's just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun little game and easy enough to play w my 8yo and 5yo.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy May

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it! We play all the time. Very much like Trouble
customer_reviews.author: TUPPERMOM

customer_reviews.title: Box was in rough shape
customer_reviews.text: Game came on time. Works just fine, however the box was squished and the plastic window was pulled away from the box. The sides where the plastic was pulled away were ripped as well. It was a birthday gift and I was a little embarrassed to give the gift looking like ace ventura delivered it. I did open and check all pieces were there.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute game but the bottom isnt even plastic its cardboard. Glad to have gotten a good deal on it. Would have been upset if I had to pay more
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but cute theme
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute because it’s shopkins themed but the quality is not as good as a standard trouble game. The pieces are smaller and it’s cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for Christmas but I wanted to check it out and it is perfect. Great product for the price. My girls will love it
customer_reviews.author: Serena Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but fun
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is a cheaply made game but it is worth it for the fun that the kid can have with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very flimsy and once I had it, I found the same thing for the same price at a local Family Dollar. I'm a little disappointed in this product. My daughter, however is happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Party time
customer_reviews.text: Very cute game. Great for my 4year olds birthday party. The girls all loved playing it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Loved “trouble” as a kid now I can give it to the little people in my life :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: It is a WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun the grandchildren loved it ands so did the grandparents! Perfect family time game with granddaughters!
customer_reviews.author: MakeMIneCountry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 6 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute version of classic "Trouble" game! Bought as a birthday gift for my niece and it was one of the first gifts to be played with after the party :)
customer_reviews.author: ktls182

customer_reviews.title: shopkins
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors...durable...perfect size game for attention of 4 yr old..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Henson

customer_reviews.title: Cute game,shipped well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for less than 4 bucks so I can't complain! Girls love it. Very cute and shipped well.
customer_reviews.author: HisKitten13

customer_reviews.title: It is really just like the game "Trouble" If you like that
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It is really just like the game "Trouble" If you like that, you will like this, and the kids will too. It is a little cheaply made, but what isn't now a days. It's too bad we have to lower our expectations
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Shopkin-obsessed grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is obsessed with Shopkins. Bought for her as an Easter happy. She was thrilled with the idea of it but didn't play with it long. She's almost 6. It's just simply a Shopkins branded Trouble game.
customer_reviews.author: Toreyy

customer_reviews.title: ... or her birthday she loves it and is a fun time for her and her brothers when she makes ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 7 year old or her birthday she loves it and is a fun time for her and her brothers when she makes them play with her

customer_reviews.title: Works but is kind of cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but: - doesn't come with any shopkins - cheap cardboard backing that is prone to ungluing - box it comes in is not the type with a nice removable lid so it doesn't pack as easily as other board games.
customer_reviews.author: watabowtbob

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I bought this for my niece and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingRebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap quality, but it is the same as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Cheap quality, but it is the same as pictured for the most part. it's a regular sized game.
customer_reviews.author: Karobr17

customer_reviews.title: Eh, better off buying trouble
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and cheap feeling. Although, my daughter loved playing with it. She managed to get the dice out and lose it about a month after we purchased this, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Anita J. Cronk

customer_reviews.title: We love the game Trouble and the theme for this one ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the game Trouble and the theme for this one is a plus for my girls, who are obsessed with Shopkins right now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Noelia

customer_reviews.title: Good item for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for gifts. The kids will love them
customer_reviews.author: Ronessa

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute graphics & colorful game. Played like the old game Trouble. The dice in the bubble popper is very, very, small. That is my only complaint. It's hard to see and for little ones to see & count.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blokland

customer_reviews.title: Cute fun for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was 4 when I bought this & loves Shopkins. It was a big hit at our house. Typical Pop Game format & easy for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: CM Albert

customer_reviews.title: HAS UNIQUE ITEMS NOT FOUND IN LOCAL STORES!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she LOVED it. Despite the fact that she has sooo many of these already, she had NONE of the ones in this set which, of course, made us both very happy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Caviness

customer_reviews.title: Just like the trouble game this is great
customer_reviews.text: Just like the trouble game this is great, I can say it is a little on the cheaper side, but for 6 bucks no complaints. My 8 year old has made us play this non stop!!
customer_reviews.author: AbbiC

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves this game. I don't mind it because it's easy to play. However, I do wish the die was a little larger as it's hard to see as it's so small. Quick and easy game to play and teach.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Shopkins lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game as a gift for my son's 4 year old friend. She loved it and all the shopkins decor all over the game was perfect! I am so pleased because she loved the gift and it was such a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift, the package looks awful. The present it self is cracked. I don’t appreciate this. Will be returning

customer_reviews.text: So cute! My niece is obsessed with Shopkins and she loved this. The price is very reasonable.

customer_reviews.title: Cute game, good for travel.
customer_reviews.text: It's very cheap version of the game Sorry! It's small and would make a good travel game. My daugher likes anything having to do with Shopkins so this was a hit for her..

customer_reviews.title: Game!
customer_reviews.text: Good thing this game is affordable.. It is very light made! I'm sure it will be wore out very quickly!

customer_reviews.title: just like the game Trouble but with Shopkins instead
customer_reviews.text: Cute games for young kids, just like the game Trouble but with Shopkins instead. My 4 year old loved playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Its basically the game sorry but with a shopkins theme but the girls liked it. Though the game took forever for us ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had this on sale for really cheap so I picked it up for the girls. Its basically the game sorry but with a shopkins theme but the girls liked it. Though the game took forever for us to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Bought as a last minute gift and was embarrassed to gift it. But you get what you pay for

customer_reviews.title: A fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game for toddlers! Perfect for anyone who loves Shopkins!

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: Had lots of fun playing with our kids. Game is a throw back to 1980's "Trouble"!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to help with counting
customer_reviews.text: Got this to play with 4 year old. She loves this game. Perfect to help with counting skills

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toy
customer_reviews.text: What a hit with my daughter. She loves to play everyday and we have joined in and made it part of our family time

customer_reviews.text: My Great Granddaughter got more Shopkins from other family members. Luckily they were all different. She's the envy of all her friends. Thank You

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it. Purchased on sale so game was perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Niece loved it. Purchased on sale so game was perfect for the price. Doesn't appear extremely durable but she will be bored with it before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Daisynur

customer_reviews.title: Nice game
customer_reviews.text: Very nice game for kids. Well designed and theme is very attractive. Up to 4 players can play. Do not need to worry about loosing the dice. Kids will love it. Suits for kids 5+

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger and made better.
customer_reviews.text: Better off to buy the real game trouble. Dice and fame is smaller. Harder to see and doesn't flip like the real game. Board game is flimy and made cheap. One star because of the cute shopkins artistic board.

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter loves the shipkins so we thought she would love this she has fun but I want kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the shipkins so we thought she would love this she has fun but I want kind of hoping the pcs would either be able to put her shopkins on the pcs to play the game with or come w shopkins attached as pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Yessss
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this game. I bought this because I loved trouble as a kid and my kids are into shopkins right now and we absolutely love it. Sooooo much fun

customer_reviews.title: Fun but product is a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little cheap but is fun to play so there's that

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: My daughter just loves the shopkins collection and she loves this game. I however am not to fond of it. Does not last very long, very poorly made.

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be more like minion trouble where the pieces are shaped like minions
customer_reviews.text: It is basically trouble with a shopkins background. I thought it would be more like minion trouble where the pieces are shaped like minions. My niece still loved it as she loves all things shopkins.

customer_reviews.title: Cute game
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Shopkins! My only complaint is that this is actually a pretty small board, so to play with all 4 players you have to sit close so everyone can reach, which is sometimes hard to do for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Kue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little girl gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece who loves shopkins. It was neat to find a game that had them.

customer_reviews.text: Not so sturdy, the pegs pop out when you press the dice bubble and then you loose you place on the game board.

customer_reviews.title: Shopkins is her favorite. This is a little bit like the game ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an 8 year olds birthday gift. She loves this. Shopkins is her favorite. This is a little bit like the game Trouble. Wouldn't recommend for a smaller than 4yr old, as it does have some very small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 8 year olds birthday. It was perfect for the party theme and at a price that was well worth it! She was very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J

product_meta.title: Shopkins Pop N Race Game
product_meta.description:
This well-known board game brings Shopkins characters to life. Players pop the dome to roll the die, then move their playing pieces around the board. When they land on another player's piece that player is in trouble--they have to move their playing piece back to Start. The first player to get all four playing pieces from Start to Home wins the game. The easy press dice dome keeps everything in place. Includes game board with enclosed die, 16 playing pieces, and complete instructions. For 2-4 players ages 5 and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This well-known board game brings Shopkins characters to life. Players pop the dome to roll the die, then move their playing pieces around the board. When they land on another player's piece that player is in trouble--they have to move their playing piece back to Start. The first player to get all four playing pieces from Start to Home wins the game. The easy press dice dome keeps everything in place. Includes game board with enclosed die, 16 playing pieces, and complete instructions. For 2-4 players ages 5 and up.
feature_bullets: A well-known gameplay system featuring Shopkins
Race around the board, but don't get sent back to Start
